Conferences, Lectures & Workshops


Celebrate Commitment to Diversity, Equity and Inclusion at the President's Diversity Awards
























Thursday, May 4, 2023
		11:00am

Performing Arts Center/Cal Poly Campus




 
	
	
			

	
						FREE


		
		
		




This event is open to:

Everyone









Share







Recognizing Campus Community Members Fostering an Inclusive and Welcoming Environment


Join us as we celebrate the commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion demonstrated by members of the Cal Poly community at the President's Diversity Awards. This event provides an opportunity to acknowledge and honor the contributions of faculty, staff and students, as well as recognized student groups/organizations and department/units. Don't miss out on this chance to recognize the outstanding efforts made towards creating an inclusive and welcoming campus environment.
